title: Autumn pear and almond tart
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '100g butter', '125g plain flour', '50g caster sugar', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '3 tablespoons ice cold water', 'For the filling', '85g apple or pear jam', '3 tablespoons ground almonds', '2 ripe pears, halved and sliced thinly', '2 tablespoons caster sugar']
